Replace.Text: All tiles in your capital gain the Paititi bonus

Unlock astrology at the beginning and have a special area "Holy Chef Academy". Every time you build a "Holy Chef Academy", all cities will gain 5% technology value. You will have a unique unit "Sacred Chef Knight" and get "Holy Chef Academy". "Knight" to instantly unlock the technology currently being researched

Devoted followers and defenders of the God of T0, they will not begrudge their lives. They have 35 [ICON_Strength] melee attack power, 45 [ICON_Ranged] long-range attack power and 3 [ICON_Range] attack range. Killing units can obtain their attacks. [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value [ICON_CULTURE] culture value and [ICON_FAITH] faith value of 666%

The characteristic holy land area can obtain 1 [ICON_Science] technology, 1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, and 1 [ICON_FAITH] faith bonus from each hill. It requires a base of 27 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity and maintenance cost of 1 [ICON_Gold] gold coin. It can be completed after completion Build an additional area

The characteristic academy area can obtain 2 [ICON_Science] technology bonus from each hill, which requires a base of 27 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity and maintenance cost of 1 [ICON_Gold] gold coin.
Instead of a temple, provide 2 [ICON_FAITH] beliefs to all land cells in the city, and provide 2 masterpiece slots

Instead of a library, it provides 5 [ICON_Science] technology, which provides 1 [ICON_Amenities] habitability and 3 [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist points, which provides 1 [ICON_Science] technology, 1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, and 1 [ ICON_FAITH]Food bonus

The characteristic academy area can obtain 2 [ICON_Science] technology bonus from each hill, which requires a base of 27 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity and maintenance cost of 1 [ICON_Gold] gold coin.

The characteristic holy land area can obtain 1 [ICON_Science] technology, 1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, and 1 [ICON_FAITH] faith bonus from each hill. It requires a base of 27 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity and maintenance cost of 1 [ICON_Gold] gold coin. It can be completed after completion Build an additional area

Devout followers and defenders of the Cult of Cooking, they will not spare their lives. They have 35 [ICON_Strength] melee attack power, 45 [ICON_Ranged] ranged attack power and 3 [ICON_Range] attack range. Killing units can obtain their attack power. 666% of [ICON_SCIENCE] technology value [ICON_CULTURE] culture value and [ICON_FAITH] faith value
Instead of a temple, provide 2 [ICON_FAITH] beliefs to all land cells in the city, and provide 2 masterpiece slots

Instead of a library, it provides 5 [ICON_Science] technology, which provides 1 [ICON_Amenities] habitability and 3 [ICON_GreatScientist] Great Scientist points, which provides 1 [ICON_Science] technology, 1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] productivity, and 1 [ ICON_FAITH]Food bonus
The God of Cooking, the only true god believed in by the T0 religion, leads all civilizations to glorious victory. I would like to pray to you sincerely!
I see your sincerity, you have no piety
I am the T0 god who leads all civilizations to victory. If you are pious, I will send you revelations.
Are you willing to accept God's guidance?
What you do means nothing, God will be everywhere
I see your sincerity, you have no piety
O pious man, you will receive revelation
I see your sincerity, you have no piety
O pious man, are you willing to accept my revelation?
O pious man, you will receive revelation
Short-sighted people are not worthy of God’s revelation
You ridiculous person, God will punish you
You savage man, God will drive you out of civilization
God will know where you are, and you will know where God is. Do you agree?
I have seen your future. You will definitely lead your people to victory.
Your future is dark and your people will leave you.
Do you agree with my apostles visiting your kingdom?
They like civilizations with high technology values ​​and are hostile to civilizations with low technology values.
Sincerely, you have received God’s revelation
If you have no piety, how could God send a revelation?
You ridiculous man, you have offended God
